name: Birds on a wire (itch)
description:
Birds are flying on the wire! 

If you don't get rid of them, connection might be lost!

This game uses only 2 buttons (alternatively Q + W or left + right arrows) to shoot sparks to free the wire.

Check the repository

All code and other stuff made by me except the ones listed below:

- Bird sprite: LPC Birds by bluecarrot16
- Shock sprites: Lightning shock spell by Clint Bellanger
- Tilesets: Super Seasonal Platformer Tiles by GrafxKid
- Explosion: Explosion effect by LIXING
- Fonts: 8-bit Arcade by Damien Gosset

Music recorded on Garageband using YMCK Magical 8bit Plug 1 & 2

Sounds were generated using Bfxr.
